website_summaries.verdict: A premier paint set with 24 practical color choices for students.
pros: Safe for kids – non-toxic and acid-free
Inexpensive, yet good quality and quantity for the price
Set comes with all the main colors one should need
cons: Quality of paint is not up to professional artist standards
Hard to wash off brushes, hands

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of these oils. I am new to oils, so I wasn't sure what to expect, but wanted something I could practice with. The tubes are rather small, and I went through two full tubes of white on my painting, but I suppose that is to be expected. For the price, you can't beat what you get. I'm so glad that I purchased these to try oils with. I am going to keep stocking this for when I try new techniques and such. It is a great selection of oils!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not for wet on wet style (Bob Ross)
customer_reviews.text: For the Bob Ross people: I think these are too thin/watery to use with a liquid hwhite base. Everything was "mud city" as Bob puts it. Gonna have to bite the bullet and get their paints or research enough to know what will work well. Could just be me, but my guess is if you're watching Bob, your skill level is similar to mine, and you're going to run into the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: amazondre

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product with adequate quantity of each color.
customer_reviews.text: ~ No complaints so far ~ Kindly see the attached pictures for the actual size. Here is how i would rate overall: Quality : Very Good Quantity: It is okie i believe, but yes wont mind if it would have been few ml more. Packing: Very nice and compact. Recommendation: Yes i do recommend this product. Note: If you are going to use these oil colors, you will need some thinner to work with these. So consider ordering turpentine oil or linseed oil. I did not order it initially and end up ordering at more price. It would be nice if you get combo somewhere. Thanks DV
customer_reviews.author: divi

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time that I bought oil paint. Color selection is good enough! I never tried expensive oil paint, so I have nothing to compare, but according to this experience I'm very satisfied!!!! If you want to try oil painting- dafinately buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mukhammad Khalidov

customer_reviews.title: Other than that its a great set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to paint so I bought her a set of oil paint along with a pack of 8 x 10 canvas panel. She got to painting and it days for it to dry, I didn't realize that these were not made to be painted on canvas. She already opened and used it so I just decided to keep it until we get the correct item for her to use this on. Other than that its a great set for beginners, the tubes are small and but has a good amount of colors for your project or hobby.
customer_reviews.author: 7even4our2wo

customer_reviews.title: Great color selection!
customer_reviews.text: The color selection that you get for the price of these paints is incredible! I'd definitely recommend this kit to students who want good quality oils, but don't want to waste money on overly priced professional paints. I just started off using oils recently, and I found that these were great for practice and fooling around on a canvas. Would highly advise new artists to use these paints!
customer_reviews.author: Gothic

customer_reviews.title: Great oil paints
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing to work with. Bendable and unlike other tubes similar these don't explode as you pop them open. Fyi you can't wash these with just soup and water. You'll need to buy a paint thinner to clean your brushes. Reading these reviews its honestly sad that there are bad ratings because you don't understand how to clean your brushes. Id buy these again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Well I like this paint
customer_reviews.text: Cheap paint, but it certainly does its job. I was taking a Painting course in school with the Winstor and Newton brand but ran out and quickly got this one. It's great and it doesn't have the toxic elements that the high brand paints have which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: JerZgal94

customer_reviews.title: You really want a review from someone who has only done 3 paintings?
customer_reviews.text: I decided I wanted to try a Bob Ross style painting. I have only done 3 so far.....so take my opinion with a grain of salt. It seems to me that only one tube of white in this kit was insufficient. There were a lot of other colors that I never even opened. Three or four tubes of white in place of peach or other colors that I could have mixed on the pallet would have been a better value. It seems to me that were too many obscure colors that took up space. If you want to do a “one off” painting. This seems like a decent value.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good but not meant for a lefty
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and I love how soft it comes on to the canvas. My biggest issue is that I’m a lefty and well it smeared a lot for me and the colors were so pigmented that it was hard to wash off my skin. This was deff not meant for a left hander to use. But I will continue to paint and enjoy it as I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ravneet Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Only used these for one sculpture, but the colors seemed true and pigmented well. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Milton

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. All different textures, some watery some too thick, clumpy, dry unable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: To wet
customer_reviews.text: This paint set is from China and the paint takes at least 3 days to dry, so you have to wait 3 days to do the next set and it is very time consuming, I would not recommend this set if time is of the essence. buy American.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The oil paints are good quality. I paint on wood canvas and color looks good. I use a little bit of paint thinner w/ the paints since it's oil based and it works great. Price is good since oil paints tend to be more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: DocJ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but wont do it again
customer_reviews.text: Bright and vibrant paints but some came out thicker than they should have . Added a tiny bit of water to my pallet and they were perfect but still annoying to have to do . They also stain my brushes worse than other oil paints have but a small price to pay for such gorgeous hues .
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Hylton

customer_reviews.title: and if you like it buy more
customer_reviews.text: For the price, why not! You can try it out, and if you like it buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi C. Bickley

customer_reviews.title: maggots
customer_reviews.text: as soon as i opened the box several maggots were visible crawling along the paints..really offputting, gross and I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and lovely colors.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, perfect for beginners. Lovely colors, it comes with a color wheel to learn as well and it’s a very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, Basic Paints.
customer_reviews.text: These are great paints to start out with. They tend to lean on the water-y side, which isn't too bad if you're starting basic paintings. The only thing I didn't like is that the oil separated from the paint (or whatever it is) quite a bit and often an oily substance would squirt out when I squeezed to start using it, which was gross. But the consistency is for someone who is not looking for super-expensive paints and is starting out as a beginning painter. Overall I would definitely recommend these paints for students or for casual painters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These paints are very good but they are not super vibrant. But this is awesome for beginners. Though keep in mind oil paints take a few days to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Paints!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to expand my oil colors! They blend perfect with my current ones and have all the colors I was looking for! great price for the variety of color as well!
customer_reviews.author: cdf

customer_reviews.title: Great Vibrant Paint
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my wife is just now starting to paint. The colors are so vibrant, and easy to use. Following instructions her canvas is turning out to be amazing. It does take a few days for the paint to dry, before you can continue to add to the painting. But overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nakeita Williams

customer_reviews.title: These paints are really great! I really enjoy them But
customer_reviews.text: These paints are really great! I really enjoy them But, they are seriously leaky and thats really hard to clean up. I tried running them under hot water and such to make it so that it isnt as sticky on the outside but it hardly helped. I suggest a more pricey brand just because they would have a less chance of leakiness, as well as the consistency may be more even.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing colors texture And good price.... Will order again ....
customer_reviews.author: Hifza atir

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the mentioned price.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find oil paints for this price !! Great deal for the price mentioned!! I would recommend these before opting for professional colors or the costly ones !!
customer_reviews.author: Hemant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners !
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, easy to blend , really helpful color wheel included !
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to mix color without wasting if you don’t have tools other than brushes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: bought as a present and she couldnt be happier! amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Hey now
customer_reviews.text: a few of the paints were ruptured but i never got around to painting until it was too late to be reasonable about a return. plus i wanted to paint. seems to be a decent value otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good, All Things Considered
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for such a large number of colors. Perfect size for the projects that I'm working on. I haven't examined all of the colors, but the suppliers sent me two tubes of identical paint (titanium white).
customer_reviews.author: Litwit

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Good color
customer_reviews.text: Just what you'd expect. Good quality. Good color. Pretty spreadable. They take a long time to dry, which is normal for oil paints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality oil paints
customer_reviews.text: The value on these paints is remarkable these are good for beginners or experts great for getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them. The colors stay vibrant and mix easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to experiment with. I love them. The colors stay vibrant and mix easily.
customer_reviews.author: lauriewilks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Neatly packaged and many different beautiful colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great and well priced, I will be painting with my Grandmother
customer_reviews.author: Just an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tool long to dry
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 days to dry, I even put my hair dryer to it
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone I. Manley

customer_reviews.title: My painting still hasn’t dried
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened but I painted something several days ago and the paint is still as wet as it was when I first applied the paint. Is this normal? I didn’t apply the paint very thick at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality paint and the color selection is also very good. The tubes look small but they last longer than I thought they would.
customer_reviews.author: Milla Abono

customer_reviews.title: Spilled some on myself, ruined a shirt, nice paint
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got a chance to try out the ol' oil paints, but the stuff I spilled was premo!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse David

customer_reviews.title: not happy at all about that
customer_reviews.text: Box was ripped apart and paints were everywhere in the shipping box, not happy at all about that. It was supposed to be a gift
customer_reviews.author: alex k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for someone. They were well plesed.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't get a cheaper price anywhere else for these quality paints.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but very small! Ran out if titanium white the first day..
customer_reviews.author: Cinthya Elizabeth Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price. So happy worth them as a little starter set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome paints!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was really good to work with. I like the flow of the paint and the colors are vibrant and very beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good selection.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to try these as yet. These are the smaller tubes of various oil colors to use for smaller paintings and detail work. Great price for the varied colors in this collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: for beginner painting.
customer_reviews.text: That 's fair color. For biginig painting with oil color. That so good. Not much color on tube , just for small painting , but I think a little bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: fara

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very high quality. I would certainly buy this again. No complaints, and a extremely good deal!! I used to pay at least double for oil paints that were not even as good as these. The bottles are big and last a long time... 5 stars!🌠🌠🌠🌠🌠
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied! Tubes leak and labels come off. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: susan allen

customer_reviews.title: These paints work wonderfully! Package includes almost every color you could ever ...
customer_reviews.text: These paints work wonderfully! Package includes almost every color you could ever need. For the price, these paints are a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Hall

customer_reviews.title: So far good.
customer_reviews.text: Note I'm a beginner at oil paint and this is my first order with oil paint. These paints are very nice as far as I can tell. Vivid colors, mix well, and dried nicely. I only had one problem with these and it is the tubes leak. The tubes are also completely filled. I'd say this is a good set for starters or if you're just wanting to save on some money. (My hand is 7in to give you a better idea on the tube size)
customer_reviews.author: Pur3-MaDn3s5Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product.. I am a beginner and this is my 2nd painting..
customer_reviews.author: Wild Serene H Force

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery and as advertised. I am very happy with this order and the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melody A. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I really like the pigments in these
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pigments in these, but you need to be very careful using​ these tubes. When you need to squeeze out paint, go from the bottom like a toothpaste tube. Squeezing close to the opening can break these tubes. Otherwise, it's good paint.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great kit with lots of color choices
customer_reviews.text: I just started using these and I love the variety in this kit. The paints are pretty nice but might need to be thinned a little; however I am just beginning so I'm not the best judge of paints but this is a great kit to get started with!
customer_reviews.author: VinoSucker

customer_reviews.title: it's a great paint for the price
customer_reviews.text: it's a great paint for the price. I don't have much experience with oil paint but the color seems pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil Paint Set for a Beginner Like Me!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of pre-mixed colors for a budding oil painter. I only gave 4 stars because I know they aren't top of the line quality oils but they are perfect for a novice oil painter like myself.
customer_reviews.author: David J.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and exactly what was expected. A little goes a long ways
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice paint if you aren't looking to pay $20 per tube.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I never heard how the paint worked. The packaging was a bit loose such that paint tubes fell out of place and difficult to reposition for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: ART005

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's paint. I play at painting, so quality I wouldn't really know but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the product and it was the right specs.
customer_reviews.author: JRD78

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paint because of the reviews that I read. I am super pleased with the quality and price of the product. I absolutely love it. In the future I plan on purchasing more of this product, I would like to purchase larger tubes of certain colors. Thanks for a great product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roden

customer_reviews.title: Missing colors
customer_reviews.text: Paints arrived in perfect shape with no leaking/damage, but 2 colors (zinc titanium and crimson red) are missing :( instead of those colors I got 2 duplicate colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of oil paints
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set but I haven't opened them yet, look perfect though
customer_reviews.author: snowdreamer49

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: with the right paints you would be surprised at the results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Small tubes"
customer_reviews.text: These paint tubes are a little smaller in size than I had anticipated! However, I do like the quantity and the affordability for an ongoing re-orders. I use oils paints on a regular and plentiful scale; as some of my canvases are very big. I will review this order again as I put them to regular production. Talk soon???
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: ... paints but my kid did and they look/work just fine. Great variety of colors as well
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not use these paints but my kid did and they look/work just fine. Great variety of colors as well. Extremely great value for the amount of colors you get as well as the quantity of paint will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: ben franklin

customer_reviews.title: Made in China...
customer_reviews.text: Made in China, and had I known this, I'd have purchased different paints. The shipper/seller or perhaps someone else did a good job covering the Made in China printing on the back with a white sticker, however, everything is required to have a country of origin label. Needless to say, that was rather sly and I thought I'd put that out there for anyone who may care. Unfortunately, shipping them back would probably cost a similar amount. Given China's reputation of putting nasty stuff in things where nasty stuff shouldn't be, I'm not sure what is in these.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

product_meta.title: U.S. Art Supply Professional 24 Color Set of Art Oil Paint in 12ml Tubes - Rich Vivid Colors for Artists, Students, Beginners - Canvas Portrait Paintings
feature_bullets: 24 HIGH QUALITY VIVID COLORS IN 12ML TUBES: 24 unique eye-catching vibrant oil-based colors that allow you to create stunning vivid masterpieces. U.S. Art Supplies superior performing artist oil paints will bring your artwork to life. They're ideal for use by professional artists, as well as the young aspiring artist.

PREMIUM PROFESSIONAL GRADE: The high intensity colors are made with premium quality pigments. The highly pigmented oil paint has a smooth consistency and the long working time permits the artist to blend colors and glaze them over a long period of time.

FUN, SAFE and EASY TO USE: Our oil paints are kid safe as they are non-toxic, oil-based, acid-free and conform to ASTM D4236 and EN71. Children, adults, art students and teachers love our paints because they are easy to use and provide great visual results.
CREATE BEAUTIFUL ART: Our paint is excellent for use on canvas and most art media for creating wall art, portrait paintings, abstracts, landscapes, scenery and more.
RISK FREE PURCHASE - 100% LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We're so confident that you'll be delighted with our paints that if you're not satisfied with them at anytime, we'll provide a full refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars235 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
